trans-unit.source: A column type for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control that is bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: 列类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>绑定到数据源中的字段的控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the BoundColumn column type in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to display the contents of a field in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的 BoundColumn 列类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件来显示数据源中的字段的内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The values are listed in a single column.
trans-unit.target: 单个列中列出了值。

trans-unit.source: The field is linked to the BoundColumn, so any updates in the data source will reflect in the corresponding cells of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 字段链接到绑定列，因此数据源中的任何更新的相应单元中将反映<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This column type is the default for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此列类型的默认设置是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To control appearance of this column, use the style properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制此列的外观，请使用的样式属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Text is not HTML encoded before it is displayed in the BoundColumn.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 文本不是 HTML 编码之前它将显示在绑定列。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: 这使得可能要在文本中嵌入在 HTML 标记中的脚本。

trans-unit.source: If the values for this column come from user input, be sure to validate the values to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: 如果此列的值是来自用户输入，请务必验证这些值以减少安全漏洞。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the field name from the data source to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要绑定到数据源中的字段名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataField property to specify the field to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>.
trans-unit.target: DataField 属性用于指定要绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>的字段

trans-unit.source: The name of the field to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要将绑定到的字段名称<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string that specifies the display format for items in the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定列中的项的显示格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataFormatString property to provide a custom format for the items in the column.
trans-unit.target: 数据属性用于为列中的项提供自定义格式。

trans-unit.source: The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form { `A` : `Bxx` }.
trans-unit.target: 数据格式字符串包含的形式，以冒号分隔的两个部分 { `A` : `Bxx` }。

trans-unit.source: For example, the formatting string {0:F2} displays a fixed-point number with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 例如，格式设置字符串 {0: f2} 显示一个带两位小数定点数。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 整个字符串必须括在大括号以指示它是一个格式字符串而不是文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text.
trans-unit.target: 大括号外的任何文本显示为文字文本。

trans-unit.source: The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 冒号前的值 (`A`常规示例中) 从零开始的参数列表中，指定的参数索引。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This value can only be set to 0 because there is only one value in each cell.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 仅将此值设置为 0，因为在每个单元格只有一个值。

trans-unit.source: The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in.
trans-unit.target: 冒号后面的字符 (`B`常规示例中) 指定要显示中的值的格式。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common formats.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了常见的格式。

trans-unit.source: |Format character|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|Displays numeric values in currency format.| |`D`|Displays numeric values in decimal format.| |`E`|Displays numeric values in scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|Displays numeric values in fixed format.| |`G`|Displays numeric values in general format.| |`N`|Displays numeric values in number format.| |`X`|Displays numeric values in hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > The format character is not case-sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified.
trans-unit.target: |格式字符 |说明 | |----------------------|-----------------| |`C`|以货币格式显示数字值。 | |`D`|以十进制格式显示数字值。 | |`E`|以科学记数 （指数） 格式显示数值。 | |`F`|固定格式显示数字值。 | |`G`|常规格式显示数字值。 | |`N`|采用数字格式显示数字值。 | |`X`|以十六进制格式显示数字值。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 格式字符不区分大小写，除`X`，它会显示在指定的大小写的十六进制字符。

trans-unit.source: The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display.
trans-unit.target: 格式字符后的值 (`xx`常规示例中) 指定的有效位数或小数位数显示数量。

trans-unit.source: For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A formatting string that specifies the display format of items in the column.
trans-unit.target: 指定列中的项的显示格式的格式化字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified value to the format indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString*> property.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的值转换为指定的格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Use the FormatDataValue method to convert the specified value to the format indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FormatDataValue 方法将指定的值转换为指定的格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method returns the string equivalent of the value if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此方法返回的字符串值的等效如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString%2A>未设置属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value to format.
trans-unit.target: 要设置格式的值。

trans-unit.source: The specified value converted to the format indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString*> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值转换为指定的格式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn.DataFormatString*>

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 重置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>为其初始状态。

trans-unit.source: Use the Initialize method to reset the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: Initialize 方法用于重置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>为其初始状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: Resets the specified cell in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 重置中的指定单元格<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>为其初始状态。

trans-unit.source: The InitializeCell method resets the specified cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> to its initial state.
trans-unit.target: InitializeCell 方法重置中的指定单元格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>为其初始状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> object that represents the cell to reset.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref>表示要重置的单元格的对象。

trans-unit.source: The column number where the cell is located.
trans-unit.target: 列号单元格所在的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否中的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>可以进行编辑。

trans-unit.source: Use the ReadOnly property to specify whether the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn> can be edited.
trans-unit.target: ReadOnly 属性用于指定是否中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>可以进行编辑。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to programmatically determine whether the column is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性还可以用于以编程方式确定列是否为只读的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref> cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果中的项<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn"></xref>编辑; 否则为不能为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Represents the string "!".
trans-unit.target: 表示字符串"！"。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Use the thisExpr field to represent the "!" string.
trans-unit.target: 使用 thisExpr 字段来表示"！"字符串。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
